meanings.definition: The text of an opera or other long vocal work.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed reading the libretti of famous operas.
meanings.sent2: The libretti for the new musical were beautifully written.
meanings.sent3: The librarian mistakenly shelved the libretti in the fiction section.
meanings.sent4: Her words danced on the page like intricate libretti.
meanings.sent5: The libretti painted a vivid picture of the characters' emotions.

meanings.sent1: The collection included various libretti from different composers.
meanings.sent2: She carefully organized the libretti on the bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The students were fascinated by the colorful libretti in the music class.
meanings.sent4: The libretti stood out like a chorus of voices in the room.
meanings.sent5: His passion for collecting libretti knew no bounds.
